0.text: Innate: Jax's basic attacks on-attack generate a stack of Relentless Assault that lasts 2.5 seconds, which refreshes on subsequent hits and stacks up to 8 times. Stacks expire one at a time, by one every 0.25 seconds. Relentless Assault: For each stack, Jax gains 3.5% − 11% (based on level)  bonus attack speed, up to a maximum of 28% − 88% (based on level).
0.html:
Innate: Jax's basic attacks on-attack generate a stack of Relentless Assault that lasts 2.5 seconds, which refreshes on subsequent hits and stacks up to 8 times. Stacks expire one at a time, by one every 0.25 seconds.

Relentless Assault: For each stack, Jax gains 3.5% − 11% (based on level)  bonus attack speed, up to a maximum of 28% − 88% (based on level).

0.text: Active: Jax  dashes to the target unit's location.
0.html: Active: Jax dashes to the target unit's location.

1.text: If the target is an enemy and they are in range upon arrival, Jax deals them physical damage.
1.html: If the target is an enemy and they are in range upon arrival, Jax deals them physical damage.

2.text: Jax can cast any of his abilities during the dash.
2.html: Jax can cast any of his abilities during the dash.

0.text: Active: Jax empowers his next basic attack or  Leap Strike against an enemy within 10 seconds to deal bonus magic damage. If Empower is used on a basic attack, it will gain  50 bonus range.
0.html: Active: Jax empowers his next basic attack or Leap Strike against an enemy within 10 seconds to deal bonus magic damage. If Empower is used on a basic attack, it will gain  50 bonus range.

1.text: Empower  resets Jax's basic attack timer.
1.html: Empower resets Jax's basic attack timer.

0.text: Active: Jax enters Evasion for 2 seconds: a defensive stance that causes him to  dodge all incoming non- turret basic attacks and take 25%  reduced damage from all area of effect abilities sourced from  champions.  Counter Strike can be recast after 1 second, and does so automatically after the duration.
0.html:
Active: Jax enters Evasion for 2 seconds: a defensive stance that causes him to dodge all incoming non- turret basic attacks and take 25% reduced damage from all area of effect abilities sourced from champions.

Counter Strike can be recast after 1 second, and does so automatically after the duration.

1.text: Recast: Jax deals physical damage to nearby enemies, increased by 20% for each attack dodged up to a 100% increase, and  stuns them for 1 second.
1.html: Recast: Jax deals physical damage to nearby enemies, increased by 20% for each attack dodged up to a 100% increase, and stuns them for 1 second.

0.text: Passive: Jax's basic attacks  on-hit generate a stack of Grandmaster's Might that lasts 2.5 seconds, which refreshes on subsequent hits and stacks up to 2 times. At 2 stacks, his next basic attack is empowered to consume them all to deal bonus magic damage.
0.html: Passive: Jax's basic attacks on-hit generate a stack of Grandmaster's Might that lasts 2.5 seconds, which refreshes on subsequent hits and stacks up to 2 times. At 2 stacks, his next basic attack is empowered to consume them all to deal bonus magic damage.

1.text: Active: Jax gains  bonus armor and  bonus magic resistance for 8 seconds.
1.html: Active: Jax gains  bonus armor and  bonus magic resistance for 8 seconds.

abilities.concerningText: If the target is an enemy and they are in range upon arrival, Jax deals them physical damage.
Active: Jax empowers his next basic attack or  Leap Strike against an enemy within 10 seconds to deal bonus magic damage. If Empower is used on a basic attack, it will gain  50 bonus range.
Recast: Jax deals physical damage to nearby enemies, increased by 20% for each attack dodged up to a 100% increase, and  stuns them for 1 second.
Recast: Jax deals physical damage to nearby enemies, increased by 20% for each attack dodged up to a 100% increase, and  stuns them for 1 second.

consume.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Trinket: Consume a charge to place an invisible Totem Ward at the target location, which grants sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).
consume.originText: UNIQUE – TRINKET: Consume a charge to place an invisible  Totem Ward at the target location, which grants  sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Holds charges that refill upon visiting the shop (3 charges).
Corrupting Potion can be used even at full health and mana.
passive.originText: Holds charges that refill upon visiting the shop (3 charges).

consume.originHTML:
Consume

Consumes a charge to regenerate 5.208 health and 3.125 mana every 0.5 seconds over 12 seconds, for a total of 125 health and 75 mana. During this time, basic attacks and damaging abilities against enemy champions burn them, dealing 15 bonus magic damage over 3 seconds, increased to 20 while the user cannot regenerate mana. Bonus damage is halved for area of effect and damage over time effects.
consume.originText: Consumes a charge to regenerate 5.208 health and 3.125 mana every 0.5 seconds over 12 seconds, for a total of 125 health and 75 mana. During this time, basic attacks and damaging abilities against enemy champions burn them, dealing 15 bonus magic damage over 3 seconds, increased to 20 while the user cannot regenerate mana. Bonus damage is halved for area of effect and damage over time effects.

1.originHTML: +  350

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+40 attack damage
+20 ability haste
+300 health

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Spellblade: After using an ability, your next basic attack within 10 seconds deals 125% base AD (+ ( 6% / 3%) of target's maximum health) as bonus physical damage on-hit, with a minimum damage equal to 150% base AD and a maximum damage against monsters equal to 250% base AD. If the target is a champion, heal for 81.25% base AD (+ ( 3.9% / 1.95%) of target's maximum health) (1.5 (begins after using the empowered attack) second cooldown).
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 3% armor penetration, and 3% magic penetration.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – SPELLBLADE: After using an ability, your next basic attack within 10 seconds deals 125% base AD (+ ( 6% /  3%) of target's maximum health) as bonus physical damage on-hit, with a minimum damage equal to 150% base AD and a maximum damage against monsters equal to 250% base AD. If the target is a champion,  heal for 81.25% base AD (+ ( 3.9% /  1.95%) of target's maximum health) (1.5 (begins after using the empowered attack) second cooldown).

1.originHTML: +  +  +  700

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+40 attack damage
+25% attack speed
+8% life steal

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Mist's Edge: Basic attacks deal ( 12% / 8%) of the target's current health bonus physical damage on-hit, with a minimum of 15 against all units and a maximum of 60 against minions and monsters.
Unique – Siphon: Basic attacks on-hit against enemy champions apply a stack for 6 seconds, stacking up to 3 times. The third stack consumes all stacks to deal 40 − 150 (based on level) bonus magic damage on-hit and slow the target by 25% for 2 seconds, while also granting you 25% bonus movement speed for the same duration (20 second cooldown).
passive.originText: UNIQUE – MIST'S EDGE: Basic attacks deal ( 12% /  8%) of the target's current health bonus physical damage on-hit, with a minimum of 15 against all units and a maximum of 60 against minions and monsters.

1.originHTML: +  +  +  525

Stats

+55 attack damage
+15 ability haste
+45 armor

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Ignore Pain: Stores ( 30% / 10%) of all post-mitigation physical and magic damage received, including on shields, which is successively taken as true damage over 3 seconds instead, dealing a third of the stored damage each second.
Unique – Defy: If an enemy champion dies within 3 seconds of you damaging them, removes Ignore Pain's remaining stored damage, and heals you for 120% bonus AD over 2 seconds.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – IGNORE PAIN: Stores ( 30% /  10%) of all post-mitigation physical and magic damage received, including on shields, which is successively taken as true damage over 3 seconds instead, dealing a third of the stored damage each second.

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Rebirth: Upon taking lethal damage, enter resurrection for 4 seconds, during which you are invulnerable, untargetable, and unable to act, and afterwards heal for 50% of base health and restore 30% of maximum mana (300 (starts after resurrecting) second cooldown).
passive.originText: UNIQUE – REBIRTH: Upon taking lethal damage, enter  resurrection for 4 seconds, during which you are  invulnerable,  untargetable, and unable to act, and afterwards  heal for 50% of base health and restore 30% of maximum mana (300 (starts after resurrecting) second cooldown).

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Lifeline: If you would take magic damage that would reduce you below 30% of your maximum health, you first gain a shield that absorbs ( 200 / 150) (+ ( 225% / 168.75%) bonus AD) magic damage for 5 seconds (75 second cooldown).
Unique: Triggering Lifeline also grants 10% omnivamp for 5 seconds. After 2 seconds into the duration, taking or dealing damage refreshes this effect to 3 seconds.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – LIFELINE: If you would take magic damage that would reduce you below 30% of your maximum health, you first gain a  shield that absorbs ( 200 /  150) (+ ( 225% /  168.75%) bonus AD) magic damage for 5 seconds (75 second cooldown).
